745230.name: Fantasy Grounds - Trailblazer 9 Heavy (WOiN)
745230.description:
Trailblazer 9 Heavy (N.E.W.)

The Trailblazer Heavy vessels are over a hundred years old and were designed to cut routes through the nightmarish hazards that fill the space of the Cauldron. When TB9H becomes a runaway train headed straight for the planet of Diana, can the PCs figure out what is going on and stop the ship before distaster strikes?
By Alasdair Stuart; art by Sade, Ellis Goodson, and Indi Martin.
Conversion by Colin Richardson
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the W.O.I.N. ruleset (currently available as part of N.E.W, and available for O.L.D. and N.O.W in the future)
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the WOiN ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
